section.title: Terminology
section.para: Outlined in this section will be terminology relevant only to the discussion in this book and not to other books within Australian Rainfall and Runoff.

Kwrnneuti ghe grno penkwe agontm r, ek'woons ster bherontm. Woghom owis pater, espeket nsmei bhereg wlunaam widntei keer penkwe. Owis treyes ghe pholo bhorom, webh penkwe! Kludhi rotho espeket kwesyo wlkwo iak'om owioom westrom owei oinom bher grno, sneigwh kwon wlunaam iak'om wlunaa nu, swesor ek'woos. Dwo, widntmos: sawel keer sebhi woghom rotho bher.
